reviewText: This 7 3/8" X 5 1/2" X 1" box contains 5 operas, each on one DVD, and a gala performance on a separate DVD. A small booklet is included that lists the casts of each of the DVDs and provides a very short Verdi history. They operas are available separately on Amazon. They are: NABUCCO (4.3 stars) 2004 Alberto Gazale is Nabucco. Susan Neves is Abigaille. Annmaria Popescu is Fenena. Riccardo Frizza conducts the Orchestra del Teatro Carlo Felice di Genova. Excellent singing, not much acting. Very static staging. The Amazon customer reviews are here: Nabucco ERNANI (4.4 stars) 2005 Marco Berti is Ernani. Susan Neves is Elvira. Carlo Guelfi is Don Carlo. Antonello Allemandi conducts the Orchestra of the Teatro Regio de Parma. Mostly excellent singing. Not much acting. The Amazon customer reviews are here: Verdi - Ernani - Antonello Allemandi (Dvd Ntsc) IL CORSARO (4.6 stars) 2004 Zvetan Michailov is Corrado. Michela Sburlati is Medora. Renato Bruson is Seid. Renato Palumbo conducts the Orchestra of the Teatro Regio de Parma. Generally excellent singing. Some amateurish camera work. The Amazon customer reviews are here: Verdi - Il Corsaro / Bruson, Michailov, Sburlati, Damato, Palumbo, Parma Opera I VESPRI SICILIANI (4.6 stars) 2003 Amirilli Nizza is Elena. Renzo Zulian is Arrigo. Vlaimir Stoyanov is Monforte. Stefano Ranzani conducts the Orchestra of Fondazione Arturo Toscanini (Buseto). Excellent singing, especially from Zulian. Walkways were constructed on each side of the orchestra so the singers could use the entire house as a stage. The video seems a little faded. The Amazon customer reviews are here: Verdi - I Vespri Siciliani [2003] (NTSC) [DVD] [2000] by Vladimir Stoyanov And here: I Vespri Siciliani-Dramma in Five Acts LA FORZA DEL DESTINO (4.5 stars) 2006 Susanna Branchini is Leonora. Renzo Zulian is Don Alvaro. Marco Di Felice is Don Carlo. Lukas Karytinos conducts the Orchestra Filarmonia Veneta "G. F. Malipiero". Faded color. Singing was generally excellent, sometimes a little ragged. The Amazon customer reviews are here: La Forza Del Destino VERDI GALA Recorded at Teatro Regio of Parma in October, 2004. Some of the singers include Jos Cura, Leo Nucci, and Tiziana Fabbricini. Lukas Karytinos conducts the Orchestra Filarmonia Veneta "G. F. Malipiero" and the Chorus of Teatro Sociale di Rivigo. The Amazon customer reviews are here: Verdi Gala 2004 / Cura, Nucci, Canettieri, Damato, Fabbricini, Rezza, Borin, Casalin, De Grandia, Michailov, Sacchi, Stoyanov, Zanellato, Palumbo, Parma BOX SET DUPLICATION The box set "Tutto Verdi" contains the same production of Ernani that this box set does. It is here: Tutto Verdi: Complete Operas
